ComicInfo.Summary:
Rick Jones and the Rangers team up to save a hypnotized Hulk!
The Hulk is captured by the Corruptor. Rick Jones puts out a call for help and Texas Twister, Shooting Star, Red Wolf, Firebird, and Phantom Rider respond. The heroes stay together, similar to how the Avengers formed.
ComicInfo.Tags: Rangers,Texas Twister,Hulk,Lobo,Rick Jones,New Mexico,Arizona,Betty Ross,Firebird,Phantom Rider,Corruptor,Shooting Star,California,Teen Brigade,Red Wolf
ComicInfo.Title: You Can't Always Get What You Want, But If You Try Sometime You Just Might Find You Get What You Need!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
